title: Fork, ca. 1600–30
markings: On shoulder of fork: embellished "N" within oval contour, flattened on top
provenance: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection; Gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two-tined pointed fork with sloping shoulders. Gilded neck elaborately decorated with leaves, masks and scrollwork. Slightly curved handle of red coral, carved with a grotesque head on the front, above it a torso and head of a man wearing a helmet. Back of handle carved in decorative pattern.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1600–30.
ca. 1600–30. Coral, silver, gilding. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-81.
